titleStmt.title: Animadversions upon Lillies grammar, or Lilly scanned An extract of grammaticall problemes. Gathered out of the inquiries, and disputes of the most judicious grammarians. Set downe by way of question, and answere. ...
titleStmt.author: Wise, Thomas, M.A.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Stansby for Richard Hawkins, and are to be sold at his shop in Chancerie Lane,

notesStmt.note: At least the Bodleian Library and the Harvard University Library have an extra leaf with an address to the reader and errata--STC.
